channel.title: Some 317 help thanks
channel.description:
Recently downloaded a server from here since i want to try 317's :
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,492527.0.html //Overloadx
So i start up the server just fine and this of course runs smoothly :
[img]http://gyazo.com/50c62b1c59b1ce7b5a80e226ddcf79a3.png[/img]
Working perfectly fine so far. I load up mopar everything is good so far. Type in a random user and pass as well as my ip.
The server then logs me in and immediately logs me right out afterwards. I recieve this error in my console :
[img]http://gyazo.com/59291f08e667e8edac5e5cb4db875ba5.png[/img]
Ive seen plenty of people with the same problem, but no definative answer as to a resolution for it.
Help would be appreciated, thanks.
Also when I look in the client.java file and search for "server =" no results are found so im not sure how to change the ip for this server either.
I believe the first issue may be cache related as I dont have a 317 cache in my c drive, only a 614 cache. So if that has anything to do with it, a link to a 317 cache would be greatly appreciated as well.
Thanks in advance for any help.

item.title: Some 317 help thanks
item.dc:creator: @zondrina zondrina
item.description:
@zondrina wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=zondrina link=topic=500224.msg3658263#msg3658263 date=1310175185]

Those servers aren’t compatible with the MoparScape client. Use the one they provided.

They only provided a server obviously if you bothered to click the link. No client though.
[/quote]
Read the topic next time.[/quote]

You sir have lashed me thurally.

I better quit the tree since apperantly it makes me oblivious to stuff lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Some 317 help thanks
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“zondrina, post:2, topic:403166”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=500224.msg3658262#msg3658262 date=1310175038]
Those servers aren’t compatible with the MoparScape client. Use the one they provided.
[/quote]

They only provided a server obviously if you bothered to click the link. No client though.[/quote]
Well it’s obviously their fault? (On multiple levels btw)

Read full topic
